fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 76.80 points or 0.38% to settle at 20,070. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 1.17% to 11.83. HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank and Reliance Industries (RIL) were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The September 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 28 September 2023.
